attributes.action: Help everyone living in the UK with the cost of living crisis.
attributes.additional_details: To improve the life’s of everyone in the UK currently struggling to live and provide for their families. All bills and rates are rising, yet wages remain the same. It can’t go on!
attributes.background: Stop fuel and energy companies, supermarkets, restaurant chains and any privately owned or commercial enterprise from raising their prices if they are already achieving significant company profits (billions). It’s getting out of hand - the rich get richer and the rest of us are struggling!!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  
 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658266
